Requirements: - `from` and `to` cannot be the zero address. - `from` must have a balance of at least `amount`. - the caller must have allowance for ``from``'s tokens of at least `amount`."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.","params":{"newOwnerAddress":"The address of the new owner"}}},"title":"Neuron","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"TokensClaimed(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Event emitted when tokens are claimed."},"TokensMinted(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Event emitted when tokens are minted."}},"kind":"user","methods":{"INITIAL_CONTRIBUTOR_MINT()":{"notice":"Initial supply of NRN tokens to be minted and distributed to contributors."},"INITIAL_TREASURY_MINT()":{"notice":"Initial supply of NRN tokens to be minted to the treasury."},"MAX_SUPPLY()":{"notice":"Maximum supply of NRN tokens."},"MINTER_ROLE()":{"notice":"Role for minting tokens."},"SPENDER_ROLE()":{"notice":"Role for spending tokens."},"STAKER_ROLE()":{"notice":"Role for staking tokens."},"addMinter(address)":{"notice":"Adds a new address to the minter role."},"addSpender(address)":{"notice":"Adds a new address to the spender role."},"addStaker(address)":{"notice":"Adds a new address to the staker role."},"adjustAdminAccess(address,bool)":{"notice":"Adjusts admin access for a user."},"approveSpender(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Approves the specified amount of tokens for the spender address."},"approveStaker(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Approves the specified amount of tokens for the spender address."},"burn(uint256)":{"notice":"Burns the specified amount of tokens from the caller's address."},"burnFrom(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Burns the specified amount of tokens from the account address. The caller must have an allowance greater than or equal to the amount."},"claim(uint256)":{"notice":"Claims the specified amount of tokens from the treasury address to the caller's address."},"constructor":{"notice":"Mints the initial supply."},"isAdmin(address)":{"notice":"Mapping of address to admin status."},"mint(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Mints the specified amount of tokens to the given address."},"setupAirdrop(address[],uint256[])":{"notice":"Sets up the allowance from the treasury address to transfer to each /Context.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe2e337e6dde9ef6b680e07338c493ebea1b5fd09b43424112868e9cc1706bca7","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6df0ddf21ce9f58271bdfaa85cde98b200ef242a05a3f85c2bc10a8294800a92","dweb:/ipfs/QmRK2Y5Yc6BK7tGKkgsgn3aJEQGi5aakeSPZvS65PV8Xp3"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Strings.sol":{"keccak256":"0xaf159a8b1923ad2a26d516089bceca9bdeaeacd04be50983ea00ba63070f08a3","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6f2cf1c531122bc7ca96b8c8db6a60deae60441e5223065e792553d4849b5638","dweb:/ipfs/QmPBdJmBBABMDCfyDjCbdxgiqRavgiSL88SYPGibgbPas9"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/ERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd10975de010d89fd1c78dc5e8a9a7e7f496198085c151648f20cba166b32582b","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://fb0048dee081f6fffa5f74afc3fb328483c2a30504e94a0ddd2a5114d731ec4d","dweb:/ipfs/QmZptt1nmYoA5SgjwnSgWqgUSDgm4q52Yos3xhnMv3MV43"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x447a5f3ddc18419d41ff92b3773fb86471b1db25773e07f877f548918a185bf1","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://be161e54f24e5c6fae81a12db1a8ae87bc5ae1b0ddc805d82a1440a68455088f","dweb:/ipfs/QmP7C3CHdY9urF4dEMb9wmsp1wMxHF6nhA2yQE5SKiPAdy"]},"src/Neuron.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd22391386d167dca5e5f464869af02b735d201b78f00fd914ef9a10e47d7153d","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://06ea7b6e71738acccea18fcf0194897506e2e654fbcf606885179d307711bfb0","dweb:/ipfs/QmRciyVKXcYzVPSYAnu9U2rSgdyip2EeCn9tndH2eg8QGe"]}},"version":1}

addMinter(address).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.newMinterAddress: The address to be added as a minter

addSpender(address).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.newSpenderAddress: The address to be added as a spender

addStaker(address).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.newStakerAddress: The address to be added as a staker

adjustAdminAccess(address,bool).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.access: Whether the address has admin access or not.

approve(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-approve}. NOTE: If `amount` is the maximum `uint256`, the allowance is not updated on `transferFrom`. This is semantically equivalent to an infinite approval. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

approveSpender(address,uint256).details: The caller must have the spender role.

params.account: The account for which to approve the allowance.
params.amount: The amount of tokens to be approved.

approveStaker(address,address,uint256).details: The caller must have the staker role.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be approved.
params.spender: The address for which to approve the allowance.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be burned.

params.account: The account from which to burn the tokens
params.amount: The amount of tokens to be burned

params.contributorAddress: The address that will distribute NRNs to early contributors when the initial supply is minted.
params.ownerAddress: The address of the owner who deploys the contract.
params.treasuryAddress_: The address of the treasury where the initial supply is minted.

decimals().details: Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation. For example, if `decimals` equals `2`, a balance of `505` tokens should be displayed to a user as `5.05` (`505 / 10 ** 2`). Tokens usually opt for a value of 18, imitating the relationship between Ether and Wei. This is the value {ERC20} uses, unless this function is overridden; NOTE: This information is only used for _display_ purposes: it in no way affects any of the arithmetic of the contract, including {IERC20-balanceOf} and {IERC20-transfer}.

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomically decreases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address. - `spender` must have allowance for the caller of at least `subtractedValue`.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomically increases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

mint(address,uint256).details: The caller must have the minter role.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to be minted.
params.to: The address to which the tokens will be minted.

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

setupAirdrop(address[],uint256[]).details: Only admins are authorized to call this function.

params.amounts: The array of corresponding amounts for each recipient

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name.

transfer(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transfer}. Requirements: - `to` cannot be the zero address. - the caller must have a balance of at least `amount`.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transferFrom}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. This is not required by the EIP. See the note at the beginning of {ERC20}. NOTE: Does not update the allowance if the current allowance is the maximum `uint256`. Requirements: - `from` and `to` cannot be the zero address. - `from` must have a balance of at least `amount`. - the caller must have allowance for ``from``'s tokens of at least `amount`.

transferOwnership(address).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.newOwnerAddress: The address of the new owner

INITIAL_CONTRIBUTOR_MINT().notice: Initial supply of NRN tokens to be minted and distributed to contributors.

INITIAL_TREASURY_MINT().notice: Initial supply of NRN tokens to be minted to the treasury.

addMinter(address).notice: Adds a new address to the minter role.

addSpender(address).notice: Adds a new address to the spender role.

addStaker(address).notice: Adds a new address to the staker role.

adjustAdminAccess(address,bool).notice: Adjusts admin access for a user.

approveSpender(address,uint256).notice: Approves the specified amount of tokens for the spender address.

approveStaker(address,address,uint256).notice: Approves the specified amount of tokens for the spender address.

burn(uint256).notice: Burns the specified amount of tokens from the caller's address.

burnFrom(address,uint256).notice: Burns the specified amount of tokens from the account address. The caller must have an allowance greater than or equal to the amount.

claim(uint256).notice: Claims the specified amount of tokens from the treasury address to the caller's address.

isAdmin(address).notice: Mapping of address to admin status.

mint(address,uint256).notice: Mints the specified amount of tokens to the given address.

setupAirdrop(address[],uint256[]).notice: Sets up the allowance from the treasury address to transfer to each recipient.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership from one address to another.
